title: Simulated Lightning Exchange Arbitrage
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Deploy two of your own ERC20 contracts MyToken on the test network, then deploy two Uniswaps, and create two Uniswap V2 liquidity pools (referred to as PoolA and PoolB) to create price differences and arbitrage conditions.

Write a contract to execute a flash exchange, you can refer to the V2 ExampleFlashSwap.
Hint: You need to use TokenA received from PoolA to exchange for TokenB in PoolB and return it to the uniswapV2 Pair in UniswapV2Call.

Requirements for solving the problem:
1. Post a link to your code repository
2. Upload the log of the flash exchange execution, which can reflect the successful execution of the flash exchange.

description: This challenge allows you to understand the principles of flash loans and flash exchanges, and how to use Uniswap to execute flash exchanges.
